dataset_id: VIIRS/NPP Imagery Resolution 6-Min L1B Swath SDR 375m NRT
title: VIIRS/NPP Imagery Resolution 6-Min L1B Swath SDR 375m NRT
summary:
The VIIRS Level 1 and Level 2 swath products are generated from the processing of 6 minutes of VIIRS data acquired during the S-NPP satellite overpass. The VIIRS sensor has 5 high-resolution imagery channels (I-bands) that have 32 detectors (32 rows of pixels per scan), with twice the resolution of the M-bands and the DNB, that span the wavelengths from 0.640 µm to 11.45 µm. The VNP02IMG product is comprised of 5 bands that are sensitive to visible, near-infrared (NIR), and thermal wavelengths. The spatial resolution of the instrument at viewing nadir is approximately 375 m for the Imagery bands, and 750m for the DNB and the Moderate-resolution Bands.

The spatial resolution of the instrument at viewing nadir is approximately 750 m for the Moderate-resolution and Day/Night Bands, and 375m for the Imagery bands.

file_naming_convention = "VNP02IMG_NRT.AYYYYDDD.HHMM.CCC.nc

    AYYYYDDD = Acquisition Year and Day of Year
    HHMM = Acquisition Hour and Minute
    CCC = Collection number
    nc = NetCDF5
